name: 7 Days to Die
description: 7 Days to Die is an open-world game that is a unique combination of first person shooter, survival horror, tower defense, and role-playing games. Play the definitive zombie survival sandbox RPG that came first. Navezgane awaits!
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP (Service Pack 3) Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Additional Notes: Running the Dedicated Server and Client on the same computer will double ram requirements. Also future releases may require more hard drive space.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 3.0 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Additional Notes: Running the Dedicated Server and Client on the same computer will double ram requirements. Also future releases may require more hard drive space.
